documentation.text: @notice Emitted when a new campaign is created
@notice Emitted when funds are finally released to the creator

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Funding goal met and window has expired"

arguments.value: Funding goal met and window has expired

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Funding goal met and window has expired"

documentation.text:
@notice Donate ETH to an existing campaign
         Once the goal is reached, the creator is paid immediately.
         Further donations are only accepted for 30 more seconds,
         and then the campaign is fully closed.
@notice Allows anyone to check if a campaign is closed

CampaignClosed(uint256,address,uint256).notice: Emitted when funds are finally released to the creator

CampaignCreated(uint256,string,string,ui.notice: Emitted when a new campaign is created

donateCampaign(uint256).notice: Donate ETH to an existing campaign         Once the goal is reached, the creator is paid immediately.         Further donations are only accepted for 30 more seconds,         and then the campaign is fully closed.

isClosed(uint256).notice: Allows anyone to check if a campaign is closed
